title: Reba McEntire
summary: Reba Nell McEntire, also known mononymously as Reba, (born March 28, 1955)[1][2] is an American country music singer, actress and businesswoman. She is often referred to as "the Queen of Country,"[3] having sold more than 75 million records worldwide.[4] Since the 1970s, McEntire has placed over 100 singles on the Billboard Hot Country Songs chart, 25 of which reached the number one spot.[5] She is also credited as an actress, having appeared in both films and television.[6] She starred in the television series Reba, which aired for six seasons. She also owns several businesses, including a clothing line.[7]
